articles.title: Hands-On Tranining with R
articles.description: A Delightful Series of Modules to Learn R Programming for Beginners and R Enthusiasts.

Welcome
This site is the official home for all information related to the Hands-On Training with R at LCCI. This is the place to find all the information you’ll need to get the most out of this program, including accessing learning materials, exercises, to RStudio, R packages, and additional resources.
Organizers
Hitendra Pandey 
Satya Vyshnavi Thondapu 
Vignesh Thanikachalam 
Important links
RStudio Server
Exercise
Prework
Install R & RStudio into your local system from Workspace ONE, or
Access RStudio Server: https://rstudio.am.lilly.com.

You need UNIX account (you should have it if you have access to CLUWE) and a membership. Please request group membership/management access to: unixacct and brainiac-compute groups for accessing RStudio Server.

Make sure you’re connect to BIG-IP client before accessing RStudio Server.
Learning Objectives
Part 1
Module
Description
01
R Introduction
02
Importing data into R
03
General Data Manipulation using Base R
04
Functions and Programming
05
Introduction to tidyverse
After each module you will have exercise to workout and instructors will be there to help you.
